footer.title: Let's work together, suggestions or questions? Get in touch!
footer.subtitle: contact

heroSection.aboutMe: I am a creative, proactive software developer passionate about solving complex problems with smart solutions. Graduated with excellence in Systems Analysis and Development.

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.subtitle: experience
workExperience.text: I have worked with web systems development and maintenance. During this time, I had the opportunity to work with system integrations, bug fixes, and development of new features. I also had the chance to work with a great team, where I could learn a lot and share knowledge.
